signup.passwordDescription: Password must contain at least 8 characters, one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number, and one special character [@$!%*?&#].
signup.successMessage: Your account has been successfully created. A confirmation email has been sent to your address. Please check your inbox and click the confirmation link to activate your account.
signup.errorMessage: An error occurred while creating your account. Please try again later or contact support if the problem persists.
